= Request =
This request is used to get the spots near the client application.


= Parameters =
<br>_lat_: The latitude of the user.</br>
<br>_long_: The longitude of the user.</br>


= Response =
<br>The response given by the server is an XML type file under the following structure.</br> 


<Folder>
   <name></name>
   <visibility></visibility>
   <Placemark>
      <Color></Color>
      <Radius></Radius>
      <Point>
         <coordinates></coordinates>
      </Point>
   </Placemark>
</Folder>

= Sample =

_request example_ = 'http://localhost/armp-dev/getspots.php?long=6.218146957908431&lat=49.10159292113388'

<Folder>
   <name>KML Circle Generator Output</name>
   <visibility>1</visibility>
   <Placemark id=3 >
      <Color>ff0400ff</Color>
      <Radius>1.2</Radius>
      <Point>
         <coordinates>6.218146957908431, 49.10159292113388, 0</coordinates>
      </Point>
   </Placemark>
</Folder>
